snippet.title: Silence of the Siren - Official Gameplay Trailer | The MIX Showcase October 2023
snippet.description: Watch the trailer for Silence of the Siren to see gameplay from this upcoming game from developer Oxymoron Games. Silence of the Siren is a turn-based sci-fi strategy game that combines exploration and exciting clashes on the battlefield. Take control over several different species, raise powerful armies, and destroy your opponents. Silence of the Siren will be available on PC.
